{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Compex |model=WPJ558 |revision=v1.0 (6A05) |est_release_date=11/30/2014 |fcc_date=12/06/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=released |type=wireless embedded board |fcc_id=TK4WPJ558 |pwr_v=24-56 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558 |cpu1_cspeed=700 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |stock_os=CompexWRT |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn }} {{TagLine|2.4GHz 3×3 Wireless Embedded Board with MiniPCI-e Slot}} :[http://www.compex.com.sg/product/wpj558/ Product page] {{•}} [http://www.compex.com.sg/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/WPJ558-v3.1-WH-144.pdf Datasheet] {{•}} [http://www.compex.com.sg/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/WPJ558-Hardware-Guide-v1.2.pdf Hardware Guide] :[http://shop.compex.com.sg/wpj558hv.html Order Sample]
===Specifications=== * [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9558 @700MHz Networking Processor * Dual Radio Solution (on-board abgn radio and 1 miniPCIe slot :that supports all Compex WLE series, including 802.11ac radio) * Integrated 48V 802.3af (alternative 24V PoE available) * Supported CompexWRT and OpenWRT firmware * Support 2 x Gigabit Ethernet Port (6A05PCW8128)
===Features=== <small> * WPJ558 is a powerful and robust wireless embedded board based on the QCA9558 CPU. :It features a 700MHz network processor and integrates an internal on-board radio and :1 miniPCIe slot that supports high power 3x3 or 802.11ac radio ([[Compex MMZ558]]). * Embedded with 128MB RAM and 16MB Flash, WPJ558 provides the ideal platform for :any applications. WPJ558 includes an integrated Power over Ethernet (PoE) that :allows WPJ558 to be used in areas where power outlets are not readily available. </small> ===Application=== *Optimized for 802.11ac Module Support *802.11b/g/n + 802.11a/n/ac Access Point *Point-to-Point High Capacity Wireless Bridge *Point-to-Multipoint High Capacity Wireless Bridge * Wireless Base Station *Wireless Customer-Premises Equipment (CPE) *3G/LTE AP (Support Third Party 3G/LTE Module)
==Images== <gallery caption="from Compex Systems"> File:WPJ558.png </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
